name: EXIT 2
description:
EXIT 2 is a free multiplayer horror game in which a team of players must collect and deliver keys and then escape, while another player must stop them as a monster.

How it works?
There are 2 teams, the Survivor and the Monster.
The survivors must collect keys scattered around the map and then deliver them to their respective key stations, once done they must then escape.
However, 1 player plays the monster that prevents the survivor from escaping and sabotages them.

Perks
Both as a survivor and as a monster, you can choose from a variety of perks that you can use to customize your playstyle.

Customization
You can choose from a variety of skins and voicelines to customize your character.
